ComicInfo.Title: With These Hands!
ComicInfo.Summary: With These Hands!: Ravage is upset when he discovers that Ursell has mutated him. Dethstryk loses control when the Seeress tells him that Ravage is still alive. Tiana saves Dack from Alchemax agents. Dragonklaw prepares to attack the surface world. Ravage takes down the Dethstryk Kill Squad after they kill Ursell.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved By the Comics Code Authority
